channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HHS says it will cut workforce by 10K, saving $1.8B annually
item.description: The Department of Health and Human Services will lay off 10,000 full-time employees and save taxpayers $1.8 billion annually in a dramatic restructuri...

item.title: The Best Way For Republicans To Extend Trump’s Tax Cuts Is To Cut Spending
item.description: The best way for Congress to extend Trump's tax cuts is to do what it has failed to do for decades: get serious about lowering spending.

item.title: NPR’s Leftist CEO’s Testimony Is Laughable, But The Joke’s On The Taxpayer
item.description: Katherine Maher told a congressional committee on Wednesday that NPR delivers 'nonpartisan, fact-based' reporting. Hilarious.

item.title: The Trump Administration Shouldn’t Disarm Itself Against Iran
item.description: Closing the Middle East Broadcast Network is not making America great again in a region critical to President Trump’s foreign policy agenda.

item.title: Education Department Funded ‘Remixing Textbooks’ To Advance Pseudo-Science And Gender Theory
item.description: The Education Department spent millions on 'remixing' text books in order to advance their far-left social agenda.

item.title: Maybe It Wasn’t Such a Great Idea to Support a Larger, More Extensive Federal Government for 100 Years
item.description: The Left gets hoist with its own petard.

item.title: Diane Sykes: A Model Judge
item.description: The chief judge of the Seventh Circuit is an example for others to follow — including in her decision to retire.

item.title: Why School Choice Is Not A Leftist Plot To Take Over Private Education
item.description: Since before the founding of our country, Americans have taxed ourselves to pay for public K-12 education.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: GOP moves to defund ‘chronically biased’ NPR, PBS after disastrous hearing

item.title: Kirk Cameron counters woke kids' shows with 'Iggy and Mr. Kirk' on Brave+
item.description: Parents alarmed about the woke direction of children's television programming, never fear: Kirk Cameron is here.

item.title: The Supreme Court Killed March Madness
item.description: The Cinderellas simply can’t compete anymore.

item.title: Shakespeare’s ‘Decolonizers’ Are Making Much Ado About Nothing
item.description: The British may be fine with flushing away their literary patrimony, but Americans should cherish William Shakespeare all the more.

item.title: A Visit to the National Gallery, a High Point in the Swamp
item.description: It’s back to the ’70s in a first-rate photo show; plus, an overstuffed, overwrought Elizabeth Catlett show. But the place, as always, looks great.
